name: daigambler VS the kaiju of Casino City
name_original: daigambler VS the kaiju of Casino City
description:
daigambler VS the kaiju of Casino City

a game by Miłosz Chrzempiec (@Mudziok)

Scary monsters apeared in Casino City ruining rng for everyone! Now the most probable thing will always happen. Join daigambler on his quest to restore proper rng in a card game about cheating the odds.
